title: A Wizard's Dozen: Stories of the Fantastic
description: In this collection of short stories, some of the characters you’ll meet include a werewolf princess, a clan of Sea Giants, a feisty king’s daughter known as The Princess Who Kicked Butt, and a fairy child kidnapped by ants. Contributors include Bruce Coville, Charles de Lint, Will Shetterly, Betty Levin, Jane Yolen, and many more. “The selections are well written, neatly plotted works that showcase a wide range of styles.”School Library Journal
author: Michael Stearns
